donate.name: 捐款

settings.features_added_soon: 稍后添加到此功能包中

add_domain_step.name: Domain name
add_domain_step.info: Add a domain that you own to your CTemplar account.

verify_step.name: Verify
verify_step.info:
For security reasons, we need to verify that you are the owner of your domain. Please add the following code into your DNS. Do not remove it even after successful verification. This can typically be done in the control panel of your domain name registrar.

Please add the following TXT record:

mx_step.name: MX
mx_step.info:
Before you can receive emails for your custom domain addresses at CTemplar, you need to add the following MX record to your DNS. This can typically be done in the control panel of your domain name registrar.

Please add the following MX record. Note, DNS records can take several hours to update.

spf_step.name: SPF
spf_step.info:
SPF is used to specify who is allowed to send email for the domain so we strongly recommend including CTemplar in your SPF record. Please add the following TXT record into your DNS. This can typically be done in the control panel of your domain name registrar.

Please add the following TXT record. Note, DNS records can take several hours to update.

dkim_step.name: DKIM
dkim_step.info:
CTemplar supports DKIM signing for custom domains. To use DKIM authentication, please add the following TXT record into your DNS for this domain. This can typically be done in the control panel of your domain name registrar.

Please add the follow TXT record. Note, DNS records can take several hours to update.

dmarc_step.name: DMARC
dmarc_step.info:
CTemplar supports DKIM signing for custom domains. To use DKIM authentication, please add the following TXT record into your DNS for this domain. This can typically be done in the control panel of your domain name registrar.

Please add the follow TXT record. Note, DNS records can take several hours to update.

home_page.title:
Armored Email
Anonymous
Encrypted
home_page.read_more_from_our_blog: 阅读更多我们博客的内容

home_feature.end_to_end_PKI_encryption: We use 4096 bit encryption. This protects users from current cryptography cracking techniques and future hypothetical attacks.
home_feature.track_your_ip: We never track your IP address, keep logs on your usage or record any identifying information at any time. We prove this by making our code readily available
home_feature.iceland_based_server: Iceland has the world’s strongest data privacy laws, so by using our Icelandic servers,your data has the strongest legal protection in the world.Drop your Swiss data plans now
home_feature.exclusive_4_wall: CTemplar’s exclusive 4 Wall Protection guarantees complete wall-to-wall protection of your data.
home_feature.learn_more_about_ctempler: 了解有关CTemplar安全性的更多信息

footer.register_to_world_most: 注册世界上最安全的电子邮箱就是现在！
footer.send_unbreakable_emails: 凭借次时代的加密技术 & 存储在注重隐私保护的冰岛的服务器上，发送安全性牢不可破的电子邮件，保护您的职业及个人信息。。。
footer.software_systems: Templar Software Systems Ltd., a Seychelles Limited Liability Company

page_about.as_the_govt_continues: 随着各国政府持续以惊人的速度收集您的私人信息，我们需要更多的数据隐私和保护。使用加密电子邮件是实现更好保护的重要一步。CTemplar致力于提供最高级别的数据保护。
page_about.idea_to_create_service:
提供这种服务的想法源自于对互联网隐私和安全方面所面临的威胁的认知。我们通过加密保护通信的手段是一种全新的方式，并将不断努力采用最先进的技术来保护您的数据。

CTemplar为用户提供世界上最安全的加密电子邮件程序。CTemplar的安全性并不仅仅在于其先进的加密技术。CTemplar的架构和安置地都是为了最好地保护您的数据免受信息访问的侵扰。
page_about.ctempler_is_a_powerful_tool: CTemplar是一款为重视隐私的用户提供的强大工具。我们的订阅者涵盖了各行各业的用户，从企业，委托保护知识产权的信托责任，到着重关注人身隐私的个人。 无论您保护什么以及基于什么原因，CTemplar都会为用户提供最先进的安全保护措施。
page_about.educators_and_missionaries:
• 受到迫害和死亡威胁的教育者和传教士
  • 逃离本国压迫政权的难民
  • 饱受战争蹂躏和/或独裁者统治国家的记者
  • 想要寻求交流沟通平台，却发现到处都是迫害的学生
  • 在竞争对手监控猖獗的商业环境中工作的人
  • 希望保护其财务信息的消费者
  • 一个担心自己隐私被泄漏，身处于相对安全且安逸环境的普通人。
page_about.regardless_who_you_are: 无论您是谁以及您想寻求什么，这种加密服务都可以帮助您找到属于自己的方式。如果您想要 保证您的信息 ,您的愿景和您的话语将被保护起来，以远离那些想阻碍它们被保护的人的视线——这是一项适合您的服务。
page_about.ctempler_legal_team_views:
CTemplar的法律团队将互联网隐私视为一种动态问题。这是一个不断发展的环境。因此，静态解决方案无法为那些重视其数据安全性的人提供所需的保护级别。

我们已经在各个司法管辖区内研究了互联网隐私的各个方面，以确保我们的服务器能位于最安全的位置。我们的服务器位于冰岛，是被公认的保护互联网隐私的首选地点。冰岛政府已证明其是保护互联网隐私的最前沿阵地，并且积极履行不受政府监管的权利。

我们的法律部门继续研究全球的互联网安全和隐私法规，以便我们不断为用户提供最高级别的互联网隐私保护。如果政策被建议进行修改，我们将首先了解并制定迁移计划，以保证完整且持续的安全性。

page_security.end_to_end_encryption: 使用开源加密技术的点对点加密
page_security.whether_you_are_sending: 无论您是向会计师，业务合作伙伴，客户，新闻网络还是仅仅是您的朋友发送敏感信息，您的电子邮件都会在我们冰岛服务器上采用严谨的公钥加密学进行自动加密，因此就连我们也无法阅读它们。只有您和您的收件人才能解码您的电子邮件。
page_security.benefit_from_world: 受益于世界上最严格的数据保护法
page_security.most_encrypted_email: 大多数电子邮件加密服务提供商都夸耀其在瑞士的数据中心。他们没有告诉您的是瑞士政府与其他国家/地区签订了信息共享协议，这意味着您的数据可能会在未经您同意的情况下与他人共享。冰岛没有共享协议，并且保持着世界上最严格的数据隐私法律，因此您的数据在我们的服务器上时刻保持加密状态，而不像在其他任何地方。
page_security.guaranted_anonymity: 保证您的数据匿名性以及零访问
page_security.we_dont_require_any: 我们不需要任何个人信息来创建您的加密电子邮件帐户。只需选择用户名和密码即可访问您的电子邮件界面。 我们行业领先的“哈希加盐法”技术保证我们甚至不知道您的登录信息。为了提高安全性，我们不会存储您的IP日志，这些日志可以追溯到您的匿名电子邮件帐户。CTemplar保证您的隐私。
page_security.simple_to_use: 简单易用的界面就像普通电子邮件帐户一样
page_security.unlike_the_old_days: 与曾经的加密电子邮件意味着复杂的手动加密和私人服务器设置不同，CTemplar为您完成所有工作。您只需发送并接收您的电子邮件，就像常规电子邮件帐户一样，并同时确保您的隐私100％安全。
page_security.encrypted_email_to_non: 将加密电子邮件发送给非CTemaplar帐户，自毁消息等等。。。
page_security.your_contacts_dont_require: 您的联系人不需要有CTemplar帐户即可发送和接收完全安全的加密电子邮件，他们只需要访问您的公钥即可解密和打开您的邮件。但是，我们建议通信各方最好都使用CTemplar电子邮件帐户以获得最大的安全性。与常规帐户不同，CTemplar保护被存储的电子邮件和标题行。

page_pricing.do_not_show_ads: 本网站不支持广告收入或订阅者数据共享。相反，CTemplar依靠订阅收入来维持和改善我们的服务质量。来自付费帐户的收入用于进一步开发CTemplar，以及支持免费用户。*Ctemplar不能用于垃圾邮件或批量电子邮件的发送

create_account.name: 创建您的帐户
create_account.take_back_liberty: 拿回属于您的隐私自由！
create_account.class_encrypted_email:
一流的加密电子邮箱
帐户创建只需几分钟
create_account.new_email_address: 这是您全新的Ctemplar电子邮箱地址。
create_account.checking_box: 选中此框即表示您已了解如果您丢失了密码但未设置恢复电子邮箱，则您的帐户将无法恢复。
create_account.password_connected: 您的密码已连接到加密密钥，如果您修改了密码，我们则会向您发出新的加密密钥，除了您的电子邮箱地址外，您帐户中的所有内容都将丢失。
create_account.recover_account: 当您忘记了密码时，该选项是用于恢复您的帐户
create_account.check_box: 如果您同意遵守我们的要求，请在此方框内打勾

billing_info.pending_payment_alert: 您的付款正在处理中，但您仍可以创建免费帐户，并且在验证付款后，您的帐户将升级为付费账户
billing_info.bitcoin_sent_timer: 倒计时结束后发送比特币将会丢失！
billing_info.pay_to_proceed: Please pay in order to proceed

page_terms.welcome_to_ctemplar: 欢迎访问CTemplar拥有和运营的www.ctemplar.com（“服务”或“网站”）。点击“我同意”在帐户注册或付款页面或以任何方式使用本网站，即表示您同意遵守本协议，隐私政策以及本网站上公布的或通知您的所有规则，政策和免责声明并受其约束（统称“条款”）。如果您不同意所有条款，或者您未满十八（18）岁，请不要使用本网站。在使用本网站之前，请仔细阅读所有条款.
page_terms.using_the_site: 通过使用本网站，您（i）同意受本条款的约束，（ii）表示您已超过十三（18）岁且能够形成具有法律约束力的合同，（iii）同意并承认通过使用服务您接受不能被放弃的福利，（iv）表示您既不位于受制裁国家也不是被禁止的人。
page_terms.please_note_terms: 请注意，这些条款规定，如果您和CTEMPLAR无法解决您和CTEMPLAR之间产生的任何争议并且争议未得到明确或通过调解解决，则争议将通过具有约束力的仲裁解决。仲裁使用中立仲裁员进行仲裁或陪审团，并受到法院非常有限的审查。仲裁员可以获得同样的损害赔偿和法院可以获得的救济。您和CTEMPLAR也同意任何索赔或争议不能作为集体诉讼。请仔细阅读下面的争议解决部分，如果您不接受以下的仲裁规定，您可能不会使用本网站.
page_terms.ctemplar_may_modify: CTemplar可以通过在网站上发布任何条款来修改任何条款。此类发布应构成适当的通知。更改将在发布后自动生效;但是，CTemplar自行决定认为对本条款进行重大修改的更改将对现有用户在以下情况下生效：（1）用户同意;或（2）在通知现有用户后三十（30）天，通过电子邮件从@ ctemplar.com电子邮件地址发送到用户的电子邮件地址与CTemplar或通过其他方式，包括但不限于弹出窗口或网站上的横幅，消息或其他明显的通知。如果您肯定同意新条款，您的协议将立即生效。您同意做出任何和所有必要的安排，以便您（而不是您的垃圾邮件过滤器）接收来自CTemplar电子邮件地址的所有电子邮件。您使用服务后通知将表示您接受更改。如果您不接受更改，您唯一的和唯一的补救措施是停止使用本网站。最新条款将发布在网站上，您应该在使用本网站之前查看它们.
page_terms.must_be_member:
您必须是会员才能使用我们的服务。要成为会员，您必须完成我们的注册过程，这需要选择用户名和密码。您同意始终保持您的密码安全，不要向任何其他人透露。您对计算机系统的安全性负全部责任。如果其他人使用您的帐户，无论您是否知情，CTemplar都不承担任何责任。
未经帐户持有人的许可，您不得使用任何其他人的帐户。您同意CTemplar对删除，损坏或未能存储任何CTemplar服务维护或传输的任何消息或其他内容不承担任何责任或义务.
page_terms.license_to_acess: 您获得和使用服务和所有权的许可
page_terms.content_information: 服务中包含和包含的内容，信息，软件，设计，材料，功能和数据（“内容”）受知识产权和其他法律的保护。使用服务时，您必须遵守这些和任何其他适用法律.
page_terms.unless_indicated: 除非另有说明，并且严格遵守这些条款，否则您只能在获得授权注册和购买我们服务的情况下访问和使用服务。就这些用途而言，CTemplar授予您有限的，非独占的，可撤销的，不可转让的，个人的和不可转让的许可，以根据这些条款使用服务。
page_terms.event_we_offer: 如果我们提供服务上的软件下载并且您下载此类软件，则软件（包括软件中包含或生成的任何文件，图像以及软件随附的数据（统称为“软件”））将获得许可由我们或第三方许可人根据本条款使用。您对本软件的使用可能受附加条款的约束，这些条款可能包含在本软件中。请仔细阅读任何其他条款，以确定有关使用此类软件的完整条件。我们不会将软件的所有权转让给您。您不得复制，复制，分发或以其他方式利用本软件，也不得将本软件反编译，反向工程，反汇编或以其他方式缩减为人类可读的形式。请注意，如果您安装了可通过服务提供的某些应用程序，则表示您同意将软件下载到您的Internet设备并接受这些条款以及与此类应用程序相关的任何其他条款。
page_terms.reserve_all_rights: 我们保留本条款中未特别授予的内容和服务的所有权利。除非获得我们事先的书面批准，否则您不得修改，分发，传输，执行，广播，发布，许可，反向工程，转让或出售，或从服务或任何内容创建衍生作品。您也不得以可能伤害我们或任何第三方的方式使用服务。例如，您不得以下列方式使用服务：
page_terms.damage_or_interface: 损害或干扰服务的正常运作;
page_terms.intercept_any_terms: 拦截我们未有意向您提供的任何内容或信息，或者取消我们已实施的任何访问控制;
page_terms.access_to_services: 允许您使用我们提供的界面以外的任何界面访问服务或内容，或尝试“刮擦”或“收获”内容。
page_terms.frame_the_services: 构建服务框架，显示与未经授权的徽标或标记相关的任何内容，或做任何可能暗示我们与任何其他方之间关系错误的内容;或以其他方式对服务，公司或任何第三方的运营产生不利影响。
page_terms.other_legal_rights: 除了我们的其他合法权利，我们可以随时以任何理由限制或终止您使用服务或服务某些功能的许可，恕不另行通知，包括我们认为您违反了这些条款.
page_terms.term_of_contract: 签订合同，续签和终止服务
page_terms.indicated_to_contrary: 除非在相应的服务说明中另有说明，否则本协议将无限期有效。协议可以由任何一方终止，通知期限为每个结算周期结束一个月。如果合同未终止，合同将以相同的结算周期自动续订。
page_terms.does_not_effect: 这不会影响CTemplar随意终止服务的权利.
page_terms.termination_option: 各关税的额外选择权，特别是额外账户或存储空间的终止使得总合同不受影响。
page_terms.termination_of_contract: 合同终止后，CTemplar不再有义务提供合同服务。及时存储和备份数据是客户的责任。
page_terms.terms_of_sale: 任何销售条款将由CTemplar发布并由您同意并且销售完成。我们接受各种付款方式。如果使用被盗的信用卡或身份购买服务，我们可能会永久关闭帐户。 CTemplar会将您的付款信息存储14天，在此期限后会自动删除。信用卡提供商可以将订单信息存储更长时间。可以通过比特币和/或其他加密货币进行匿名支付.
page_terms.primium_service: 优惠服务将在确认付款后立即送达.
page_terms.entitled_to_full: 在付款完成后的14天冷静期内，或者在“使用”服务之前，您有权获得任何付费电子邮件帐户的全额退款，以先到者为准。提供的服务被认为是“使用过的”。第一封电子邮件发送时.
page_terms.terms_and_conditions: 适用于移动应用程序的条款和条件
page_terms.once_you_registered: 一旦您在本网站上注册为用户，您可以选择下载并使用任何可用的CTemplar移动应用程序（“应用程序”）。通过下载和使用一个或多个CTemplar应用程序，您同意除本协议管辖您对应用程序的使用之外，以下特别适用于您使用应用程序的条款和条件（ “移动条款”）也适用于您：
page_terms.rights_to_use: 您使用该应用程序的权利是有限的：您可以在Apple的App Store和Google Play服务条款中规定的使用规则允许的任何设备上使用该应用程序，但您不得转让您的使用权利该应用程序给任何其他人;
page_terms.solely_responsible: CTemplar（而不是Apple或Google）全权负责根据适用法律要求提供有关应用程序的任何维护和支持服务，并且您承认Apple和Google没有义务提供任何维护和支持与应用程序有关的服务;
page_terms.apple_and_google: 对于可能适用于该应用程序的任何产品保证（如果有），Apple和Google概不负责，无论是明示的还是默示的，如果应用程序发生任何故障，您可以通知Apple或Google以及Apple或Google将退还应用程序的购买价格（如果有）给予您，并且在适用法律允许的最大范围内，Apple，Google和CTemplar均不对应用程序承担任何其他保证义务，以及在CTemplar与Apple或Google之间，其他索赔，损失，责任，损害赔偿费用或因未能遵守任何保证（如果有）而产生的费用应由CTemplar承担全部责任;
page_terms.acknowledge_that_between: 您承认，在CTemplar与Apple和Google之间，CTemplar（而不是Apple或Google）有责任解决您的应用程序或您拥有和使用应用程序的任何第三方索赔。;
page_terms.acknowledge_that_in_event: 您承认，如果任何第三方声称应用程序或您拥有和使用应用程序侵犯了此类第三方的知识产权，CTemplar而非Apple或Google将全权负责调查，辩护，解决和解除任何此类知识产权侵权索赔;
page_terms.represent_and_warrant: 您声明并保证：（i）您所在的国家不受美国政府禁运，或被美国政府指定为“恐怖主义支持”国家; （ii）您未被列入任何美国政府禁止或限制方的名单;
page_terms.dispute_resolution_contains: 第19节（DISPUTE RESOULTION）包含CTemplar的电子邮件和邮寄地址，您可以在其中解决问题，投诉或索赔以及与应用程序相关的条款;
page_terms.govern_any_dispute: 部分 19 (争议解决) shall govern any dispute that may arise between you and CTemplar related to the App(s);
page_terms.acknowledge_that_apple: 您承认Apple和Google及其子公司（统称“Apple”和“Google”）是本协议的第三方受益人，并且在您下载和使用表明您同意和同意移动条款的应用程序时， Apple将有权（并将被视为已接受该权利）作为其第三方受益人对您执行移动条款.
page_terms.in_no_event: 在任何情况下，CTEMPLAR，其父母，子公司，高级职员，董事，股东，雇员，代理人，合作伙伴，顾问，继任者或受让人均不对任何间接，特殊，偶然，继发，惩罚性或惩戒性损害负责（包括但不限于此）由业务，利润，数据，使用，收入或其他经济优势造成的损失，由我们的网站，我们的服务或基于任何理论的条款引起或与之相关，即使被告知此类损害的可能性。上述损害的限制是美国和你之间关于基金的基本要素。本网站不提供此类网站，不受此限制。在任何情况下，我们的责任以及我们的父母，子公司，官员，董事，雇员和供应商对您或任何第三方在任何情况下的责任均不超过（A）12个月内向CTEMPLAR支付的金额在提起责任的行动之前，或（B）100美元。某些州或其他司法管辖区不允许排除或限制偶发或继发损害，因此上述限制和排除条款可能不适用于您.
page_terms.agree_to_indemnify: 您同意赔偿并保持CTemplar，其父母，子公司，高级职员，董事，股东，员工，代理人，合资企业，顾问，继承人和受让人免受所有损失，成本，责任和费用的损害，包括合理的律师和＃39;任何由于您在本网站上的使用或行为而产生或产生的任何第三方声称的费用。
page_terms.dispute_with_ctemplar: 如果您与CTemplar有争议或CTemplar与您发生争议并且此类争议无法以非正式方式解决，则此类争议将根据以下规定以个人方式解决：
page_terms.informal_resolution: 非正式决议。在启动调解或仲裁之前，有申诉的一方必须:
page_terms.notify_the_other_party: 以书面形式通知另一方争议事实和所有索赔。这样的写作必须发送到用户的CTemplar或CTemplar，Orange Project ehf，Armula 4＆amp; 4的电子邮件地址。 6，雷克雅未克108，冰岛或support@ctemplar.com，以适用者为准（“争议通知””);
page_terms.party_receiving: 收到争议通知的一方在收到争议通知后三十（30）天内作出回应.
page_terms.other_party: 另一方有15天时间考虑回复和回复.
page_terms.mediation_if_the_dispute: 调解。如果争议未得到非正式解决，任何一方都可以在另一方的同意下提出调解请求。如果任何一方要求调解并且双方同意进行调解，调解费用将由各方平均承担。
page_terms.arbitration: 仲裁。如果调解不发生或如果调解不能解决争议，则双方同意仲裁任何争议，因为这些争议是由本协议引起的或与本协议有关的。特别是，您同意，通过同意这些条款，您将放弃通过陪审团进行审判的权利，包括所有争议，索赔和争议，任何排序或性质，在我们之间，由于使用本网站而放弃参加任何争议的集体，集体或代表诉讼的权利。您了解这构成了在任何法庭上对任何索赔提出任何和所有权利的豁免。您同意，任何争议都应仅在个人基础上解决。你必须提出任何要求仲裁的要求。这种仲裁是最终的，具有约束力，并将受到商业仲裁规则和消费者相关争议的补充程序的管辖。仲裁裁决的决定在任何一个司法管辖区都具有约束力和执法能力。
page_terms.class_action_waiver: 集体行动豁免。您和CTEMPLAR明确同意：（i）每一方必须仅以个人身份向其他人提出索赔，而不是作为任何普通类，大众，集体或代表诉讼的普通人或类别成员; （ii）在双方之间的任何仲裁中，不得有任何类别的索赔，合并或合作者; （iii）不得通过代表一类用户或以其他方式代表一类代表索赔的行动（“集体诉讼豁免”）作出任何索赔。
page_terms.dispute_resolution_section: 本争议解决部分在本条款终止后继续有效.

page_privacy.privacy_policy_continues: Our privacy policy continues our commitment to serve you and explains how we intend to protect your privacy. We are responsible for the protection of your personal data and we take this responsibility very seriously. All basic customer data in Ctemplar.com are encrypted end-to-end. This Privacy Policy covers Ctemplar.com’s (“CTemplar”, “We”, “Us”, “Our”) treatment of information we collect when you are on our site and when you use our services. CTemplar has created this privacy statement to demonstrate our firm commitment to protect your privacy and to fully disclose what information we collect and how we use it.
page_privacy.privacy_notice: This privacy notice discloses the privacy practices for CTemplar and our website www.ctemplar.com(“Site”). This privacy notice applies solely to information collected by this website, except where stated otherwise. It will notify you of the following:
page_privacy.policy_changes: how policy changes will be communicated;
page_privacy.address_concerns: how to address concerns over misuse of personal data.
page_privacy.sole_owner: We are the sole owners of the information collected on this site. We only have access to/collect information that you voluntarily give us via email or other direct contact from you. We will not disclose your personal data including your email address to third parties, categorically. There will be no sale of data. Unless you ask us not to, we may contact you via email in the future to tell you about specials, new products or services, or changes to this privacy policy.
page_privacy.access_to: Your Access to and Control Over Information
page_privacy.may_opt_out: You may opt out of any future contacts from us at any time. You can do this by changing your contact preferences on the site, or by contacting us via the email address or phone number provided on our website.
page_privacy.to_use_this_website: In order to use this website, a user must first complete the registration form. During registration a user is required to give certain information (such as name and email address). This information is used to enable your use of the Site.
page_privacy.not_disclose: We will not disclose your personal data including your email address to third parties, categorically. We use a credit card processing company to bill users. These companies do not retain, share, store or use personally identifiable information for any secondary purposes.
page_privacy.partner_with: We may partner with another party to provide specific services. When the user signs up for these services, we will share names, or other contact information that is necessary for the third party to provide these services. These parties are not allowed to use personally identifiable information except for the purpose of providing these services.
page_privacy.take_all_reasonable: We take all reasonable precautions to protect your information. When you submit sensitive information via the website, your information is protected both online and offline.
page_privacy.collect_sensitive: Wherever we collect sensitive information (such as credit card data), that information is encrypted and transmitted to us in a secure way.
page_privacy.use_encryption: While we use encryption to protect sensitive information transmitted online, we also protect your information offline. Only employees who need the information to perform a specific job (e.g. billing or customer service) are granted access to personally identifiable information. The computers/servers on which we store personally identifiable information are kept in a secure environment.
page_privacy.site_contain_links: This web site may contain links to other sites. Please be aware that we are not responsible for the content or privacy practices of such other sites. We encourage our users to be aware when they leave our site and to read the privacy statements of any other site that collects personally identifiable information.
page_privacy.time_to_time: From time-to-time our site may request information via surveys or contests. Participation in these surveys or contests is completely voluntary and you may choose whether or not to participate and therefore disclose this information. Information requested may include contact information (such as name and address), and demographic information (such as zip code, age level). Contact information will be used to notify the winners and award prizes. Survey information will be used for purposes of monitoring or improving the use and satisfaction of this site.
page_privacy.compliance: Compliance and Cooperation with Regulatory Authorities
page_privacy.regularly_review: We regularly review our compliance with our Privacy Policy. We also adhere to several self-regulatory frameworks. When we receive formal written complaints, we will contact the person who made the complaint to follow up. We work with the appropriate regulatory authorities, including local data protection authorities, to resolve any complaints regarding the transfer of personal data that we cannot resolve with our users directly. Requests made by regulatory authorities for subscriber information will be responded to by CTemplar asserting all legal claims to refuse compliance.
page_privacy.not_abiding: If you feel that we are not abiding by this privacy policy, you should contact us immediately via telephone at the contact phone number listed on the Site, or via email at
page_privacy.not_provide: We do not provide aggregated usage or tracking information to third parties.
page_privacy.receiving_email: When receiving email from us, we may place a small piece of code in that email to determine whether or not you can accept HTML images and whether or not you viewed and/or clicked on links contained in the email. This process does not leave any information on your computer, nor does it collect information from your computer. Email opt-outs. In the event you decide to unsubscribe from our newsletters or promotional emails we will honor your request within thirty business days.
page_privacy.knowingly_collect: CTemplar does not knowingly collect information from children under the age of 18. On-line registration is restricted to adults. Persons under 18: Do not send any information about yourself to us--including information such as your name, address, or e-mail address. We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from children under 18. In the event that we learn we have collected any personal information from a child under the age of 18 without verification of parental consent, we will delete that information from our database as quickly as possible.
page_privacy.registered_users: Registered users have the option of accessing, correcting, updating and modifying Personal and/or Financial Information, or visitor profile, at any time and as often as desired. You may elect to stop receiving marketing material from CTemplar or on behalf of external third party business partners. Users may choose to stop receiving such communications at any time by visiting their member profile page or by following instructions at the end of any such e-mail received.
page_privacy.bit_of_data: A "cookie" is a bit of data sent by a Web site through the browser to the computer of the user visiting the site, and enables the site to return the results the browser expects. CTemplar uses temporary, session-specific cookies to ensure visits to the Site are smooth and customized for the visitor. Such cookies allow us to provide a visitor's browser with information tailored to the visitor's preferences and needs. CTemplar also uses permanent or persistent cookies that remain on a visitor's computer after the visitor leaves the Web site.
page_privacy.want_your_browser: If you do not want your browser to accept cookies, you can turn off the cookie acceptance option in the browser's settings. Disabling the cookie support function of the browser will, however, prevent our Web site from functioning properly and you may not be able to utilize fully all of the site's features and information.
page_privacy.use_advertising: We use advertising companies to develop banner ads for our Digital Offering. These ads may contain cookies. These companies collect cookies sent to your browser through the banner ads and we do not have control or access to this data. Information may be collected from a third party through the use of cookies and web beacons to measure website traffic.
page_privacy.use_pixel_tags: This Site may also use pixel tags, also known as beacons, spotlight tags or web bugs, to improve our understanding of site traffic, visitor behavior, and response to promotional campaigns, as a supplement to our server logs and other methods of traffic and response measurement. Pixel tags are sometimes used in conjunction with small JavaScript-based applications, also for the purpose of traffic measurement. We may also implement pixel tags provided by other companies, for the same purpose. You can disable pixel tags by changing your browser settings to omit images and disable JavaScript; or there are commercial software packages available that can omit pixel tags and most advertisements.
page_privacy.located_in_eu: If you are located in the EU, United Kingdom, Lichtenstein, Norway, or Iceland, you may have additional rights under the EU General Data Protection Regulation (the “GDPR”) related to your personal data. We will be the controller of your personal data processed in connection with the Site.
page_privacy.without_prejudice: Without prejudice to any other administrative or judicial remedy, every customer shall have the right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority, in particular in the Member State of his or her habitual residence, place of work or place of the alleged infringement if the customer considers that the processing of personal data relating to him or her infringes this Regulation.
page_privacy.optional_opportunity: Should you select the optional opportunity to receive promotional emails from us about current offers and incentives, we will also use your email for this purpose. If you have not selected this Opt-in option,  you will not receive promotional emails. If you have opted to receive promotional emails, or if you receive transactional emails about your incomplete order, you may choose to remove (Opt-out) this feature at any time and the emails will be stopped.
page_privacy.contact_information: Your contact information may also be used should we ever need to contact you regarding your order.
page_privacy.customer_has_right: The customer has the right not to be subject to a decision based solely on automated processing, including profiling, which produces legal effects concerning him or her or similarly significantly affects him or her.
page_privacy.signify_acceptance: By using our Site you signify your acceptance of the terms of this Privacy Policy. If you do not agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy, please do not use the Site and exit immediately. Consent may be withdrawn at any time by emailing us at support@ctemplar.com. Corrections may also be made by emailing us at support@ctemplar.com.
page_privacy.contain_links: The site may contain links to and from partner and/or affiliate websites. If you follow a link to their sites, please note that these sites have their own privacy policy and that CTemplar does not accept any responsibility or liability for protection of personal data which you may submit to a third party's site. You are recommended to check the wording of the relevant privacy policies before you submit any personal data to those sites.
page_privacy.event_of_sale: In The Event of Sale or Bankruptcy
page_privacy.ownership: The ownership of CTemplar may change at some point in the future. Should that occur, we want to be able to maintain a relationship with you. In the event of a sale, merger, public offering, bankruptcy or other change in control of CTemplar, your information may be shared with the person or business that owns or controls this site. Opting out of receiving information from third parties will not affect our right to transfer your information to a new owner, but your choices will continue to be respected regarding the use of your information. You will be notified as described below in “Changes to Privacy Policy.”
page_privacy.amend_this_policy: CTemplar may amend this policy from time to time. If we make any material changes we will notify you by email (sent to the e-mail address specified in your account) or by means of a notice on this website prior to the change becoming effective. We encourage you to periodically review this page for the latest information on our privacy practices. If we make any substantial changes in the way we use your personal information, we will notify you by posting a prominent notice in our privacy policy or in other locations on our Web site or by sending you an email to inform you of our updated privacy policy.
page_privacy.not_like_it: We do not like it, we do not support it, and we do not engage in it. If you do not want to receive e-mail from us in the future, please let us know by contacting Customer Service at support@ctemplar.com. Be sure to specify whether you want to be removed from a certain e-mail list or all of our product e-mail lists.
page_privacy.any_questions: If you have any questions on our Privacy Policy, or complaints about our handling of your Personal and/or Financial Information, you can contact us at 1 (800) 319-5820 or
